name: Lontra-Metragem
summary: In the city of Lontrina, the last rental company in the world is on the rise! Several cinephile animals from all over the country are eager to visit it. Among them, a very astute otter, who is not there to rent DVDs. Guide this little thief through this sprawling video store, slipping out of sight of the staff to complete her mission: borrow lots of DVDs… …without warning! And, of course, without getting caught, because you need to take these DVDs to your neighborhood otters!
